A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: About the only thing that was really difficult was they crammed too much film into too short a period of time.  Honestly i think it would have served a greater purpose to make the Last Jedi a 2-parter so viewers didn't feel so rushed.  Having said that it was crazy SYFY madness along with subtle reminders of how and where it all began.  I for one loved it.
